```{r 3.1}
library(rethinking)

PrPV = 0.95
PrPM = 0.01
PrV  = 0.001
PrP = PrPV * PrV + PrPM*(1-PrV)
PrVP = (PrPV * PrV) / PrP
```

```{r 3.2-3.5}
p_grid = seq(0,1, length.out = 1e3)
prior = rep(1, 1e3)
likelihood = dbinom(6, size = 9, prob = p_grid)
post = prior * likelihood
post = post / sum(post)
samples = sample(p_grid, prob = post, size = 1e4, replace = TRUE)
plot(samples)
dens(samples)

```
